tool_description: A concise linguistic resource delivering pronunciation, definition, part of speech, and example usage for words via a single GET endpoint. Enrich your applications with accurate language insights.
name: Dictionary Data API
title: Dictionary Data API

api_list.name: GetDefinition
api_list.description: This is used to retrieve definition, pronunciation and example usages of any word
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dictionary-data-api.p.rapidapi.com/definition/dance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dictionary-data-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dictionary-data-api.p.rapidapi.com/definition/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dictionary-data-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
